		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_armlet"                      "Armlet of Mordiggian"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Description"                          "<h1>Toggle: Unholy Strength</h1>When active, Unholy Strength grants +%unholy_bonus_damage% damage, +%unholy_bonus_strength% strength and +%unholy_bonus_armor% armor, but drains %unholy_health_drain_per_second_tooltip% health per second.<br><br> You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Lore"                                 "Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note0"                                "The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note1"                                "The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_Note2"                                "Activating or deactivating Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_bonus_damage"                         "+$damage"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_bonus_attack_speed"                   "+$attack"

"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet_bonus_health_regen"                   "+$hp_regen"

"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_armlet2"                      "Forest Armlet of Mordiggian"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet2_Description"                          "<h1>Toggle: Unholy Strength</h1>When active, Unholy Strength grants +%unholy_bonus_damage% damage, +%unholy_bonus_strength% strength and +%unholy_bonus_armor% armor, but drains %unholy_health_drain_per_second_tooltip% health per second.<br><br> You cannot die from the health drain when Unholy Strength is activated, nor from the strength loss when Unholy Strength is deactivated."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet2_Lore"                                 "Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet2_Note0"                                "The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet2_Note1"                                "The strength change occurs over 0.6 seconds."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet2_Note2"                                "Activating or deactivating Unholy Strength does not interrupt channeling."
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet2_bonus_damage"                         "+$damage"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet2_bonus_attack_speed"                   "+$attack"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet2_bonus_armor"                          "+$armor"
"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_armlet2_bonus_health_regen"                   "+$hp_regen"

Dezolator absorbed all the malice and hatred of its creator. Stegius destroyed many worlds, not sparing their inhabitants, in fact completely destroyed the 3rd and 4th dimensions. For this, the seal of Al-Galor was imposed on him, and now Stegius will never find peace. He will destroy and destroy. All and all. Until he is destroyed by his own fury."

  "npc_dota_hero_invoker" "Carl"
  "npc_dota_hero_arena_hero_shinobu" "Carl"
  "npc_arena_hero_shinobu_hype" "Shinobu may seem fragile, but she is able to quickly gain advantage and defeat the enemy in the early game. Built-in lifesteal, huge damage, and in case of what, she is able to hide in the shadow of her allies, where she will not see even the sharpest eye."
  "npc_arena_hero_shinobu_bio" "Shinobu Oshino - once a powerful vampire, who received the nickname «King of Kaya». In the past, she was a princess of noble blood named Acerola, who became the legendary vampire Kiss-Shot Atserola-Orion Hart-Ander-Blade. Earlier she lost her former strength and since then looks like an eight-year-old girl. After the events of Split in her world, a gap has formed, leading to another world - into the arena of Angels and Demons. From the breach it was incredible power, and therefore Shinobu decided to enter it, hoping to fill its lost forces. So she fell on the battlefields of Angels and Demons. Gathering the remnants of his forces, the supreme vampire will have to make every effort to survive in this fight and become stronger stronger than ever."

  "npc_dota_hero_arena_hero_saber" "Saber"
  "npc_dota_hero_pangolier" "Saber"
  "npc_arena_hero_saber_hype" "Saber is effective at all stages of the game. Increasing her armor and damage from mana, she heads the offensive, taking the main blow at herself, or ends the battle with one stroke of Excalibur, bringing down on the command of the enemy a beam of pure light."
  "npc_arena_hero_saber_bio" "Many believe that King Arthur was a man. But, as often happens, legends are not always true. Saber, or Arturia, was born in the time of chaos and wars that began with the collapse of the Roman Empire. The empire was considered inviolable, but everyone expected its destruction at the hands of invading barbarians. In preparation for the war against the barbarians, Rome stripped its island province of all the military forces on it. After Britain lost the protection of the empire, it could not escape independence, as a result of which it was shattered into smaller parts. During these barbarian invasions and self-destruction from the constant struggle between the clans, a long period of war began, which later became known as the «Dark Ages». Arturia was born during this period, as the heir to the throne, the daughter of the King of England, Uther Pendragon, and the blue-eyed Igraina, the wife of the servant Uther, the Duke of Cornwall. The king believed in Merlin is prophecy and longed for the birth of a child to designate him as successor, but the child was not born the way he had expected. The legend says that Merlin helped Uther to spend the night with Igreina, and as a payment demanded to leave him to Arthur for education, saying: «I will lead the correct way of this child, carrying a great destiny, and protect him from enmity and evil that reign in the royal Court.» The reality was that Arturia was not born a boy, and the king could not make a woman his successor, even if the destiny of this child to become a king once. She was instructed by the king is vassal to be educated as a simple knight. Realizing the situation, the king fell into despair, but Merlin was delighted, because the floor absolutely does not matter, in order to become a king. He was sure, the fact that the girl will be away from the castle until the day of prophecy, will be proof that she will become king. On the day of prophecy, knights and lords assembled from all over the country to choose the next king. Everyone expected that the best for the role of the king will be chosen with the help of knightly competitions, but the only thing that was on the site of selection was a naked sword stuck in the stone, with a gold inscription on the hilt: «The king of the law for England will be he who is this sword of stone Will take it out.» Many knights tried to pull the sword, but none could do it. After all the assembled failed and decided to choose the king by the usual, chivalrous method, Arturia, who did not yet have the right to the title of knight, approached the stone at the empty spot of selection and without hesitation reached for the sword. Before grabbing him, Merlin appeared before her and said to think it over before taking it. He told her that by taking this sword, she would no longer be a man, but she only nodded, because she was ready to «become a king, then cease to be a man» since birth. She knew that the king is the one who will kill anyone to protect everyone. She thought about it every night and decided with the arrival of the morning. Although it was not one day, she said that everything will end today. She easily pulled out her sword, and the square was filled with light. At that moment, she ceased to be just a man. The king's sex does not matter, and no one will care about his appearance until the king behaves like a king. Even if someone noticed that the king was a woman, it would not be a problem if she was a good king. The time of the king began, which will become a legend. Arturia needed to behave like the son of a king, because in order to control many territories and control knights, one had to be a man. And although some people grew suspicious, only her father, Merlin and Kay knew the truth about her personality. To hide the truth about herself for life, she literally closed herself in the armor, and thanks to her immortality because of the protection of fairies, no one had any questions about her small body, or a person more like a girl. She was revered by knights as a handsome king, and seemed an invincible warrior whose appearance or body size influenced her position."

  "npc_dota_hero_arena_hero_zaken" "Zaken"
  "npc_dota_hero_broodmother" "Zaken"
  "npc_arena_hero_zaken_hype" "Zaken masterfully owns seven swords at the same time. Rotating them around themselves and entangling their enemies with a net, he crushes them into a salad. And if they survived, then he calls his faithful sailors to finish off the weakened enemy."
  "npc_arena_hero_zaken_bio" "Zaken is the legendary king of pirates. From the very childhood of his parents, soldiers were killed. The boy miraculously survived and lived in the slums of one of the many port cities. He had an innate talent - he could pick up objects and manipulate them. Zaken always dreamed of sea voyages, watching merchant ships in the port. But one day a ship appeared, sharply different from all previously seen by the boy. The wind waved black torn sails, and the flag bore the image of a human skull. The ship opened fire on the wharf, shattering coastal taverns and benches. People fled in panic, leaving all their good. When the wharf was empty, the ship entered the bay, and pirates descended from its side, collecting all the valuables abandoned by the merchants.\nMiraculously survived Zaken with admiration watched the sea brigands. To get on the ship, he climbed into a large box full of furs. The pirates seized Zaken with the box and left.\nSoon Zaken was found. The boy was not thrown overboard and given a chance to show himself. For many years he roamed the sea on the ship «Dead Dream». Like every boy, he began with the drayaniya of decks, but, having shown himself in battle, he earned the respect of the team and the captain. His telekinetic abilities allowed him to masterfully master immediately with seven swords. At a young age, no one could cope with his art on an equal footing, in a fair fight. Soon he was promoted to the boatswain and became the captain's right hand, but this was not enough for the young man. He wanted his ship. But one day, over all piracy, the threat of extinction looms. A large trading company, by investing huge amounts of money, built a huge military fleet to end robbery once and for all. And then seven kings of pirates gathered in the secret bay of the Dark Leviathan to discuss countermeasures. It was decided to collect their fleet and give battle to the trading company. This fight would decide who will rule the seas. And two fleets clashed in the Caribbean. The ships went to the bottom one after another, and it was clear that the defeat of the trading company was inevitable. But the sea opened, and a huge something, covered in green skin, overturned the entire fleet of pirates. «Leviathan!» Shouted the sailors. Huge tentacles dragged the ships to the bottom. Few ships managed to survive. Among them was the ship Zaken. The captain was killed during the battle, so Zaken took his place. No one disputed this, because the sailors understood that it was pointless to fight with him. He showed himself to be an excellent commander. Collecting the remains of pirates scattered throughout the world, he proclaimed himself the last King of pirates and vowed to end the company."

  "npc_dota_hero_arc_warden" "Stargazer"
  "npc_dota_hero_arc_warden_hype" "The mysterious Stargazing Shadow moves around the battlefield, repelling damage to enemies and incinerating them with a beam of clean energy. Even despite the Split, the Stargaizer continues to grow, although not so fast, but even so it will be difficult for enemies to surpass it."
  "npc_dota_hero_arc_warden_bio" "Ancient essence, born at the dawn of the universe, Stargaizer, personifies by its existence curiosity, peculiar to everyone. Traveling through the worlds, Stargaizer absorbs knowledge and experience of living beings like a sponge, becoming stronger with every moment. No one knows what it knows, whether it has consciousness - no one has yet come into contact with this astral entity. The stargazing increases and becomes larger, as the Universe itself: the more worlds, the more space, the faster the flow of time, the stronger, smarter and more clever the Stargazer. However, Split stirred up the entire Universe. This phenomenon also affected him - the Universe split in half, which affected his powers, which prevented him from moving further in the knowledge of being. Therefore, Stargaizer stepped on the battlefields of the Angels and Demons. Gathering the remnants of his forces, he will do everything necessary for the disappearance of the anomaly, in order to restore everything to normal, to restore order. After all, there will be no order and development of the Universe - there will not be Stargeyzer. To perish or grow - the third is not given to him."

		"difficulty_hardcore_info" "<h1>Hardcore</h1>— Enemies have <b>300%</b> increased health<br>— Enemies deal <b>300%</b> increased damage<br>— Enemies are empowered with <b>3</b> random buffs<br>— Players are limited to <b>x1</b> life<br>— Players attributes are <b>50%</b> less efficient"

        "npc_dota_hero_dark_seer" "Saitama" "npc_arena_hero_saitama_hype" "Appearance is deceptive. Passing through brutal training, Saitama destroys the limit of his strength, which allows him to multiply them. Do you have enough will to go through them?" "npc_arena_hero_saitama_bio" "According to Saitama, back in his childhood, he spent a lot of time watching the superhero shows, and he dreamed that one day he could become the same hero like them. Saitama was an ordinary office plankton, which was constantly built in to work, but was refused. Once, after another interview, Saitama was returning home from one of the streets when he heard people shouting that there was a danger ahead and that everyone was saving, but he was moving on and was meeting a huge monster crab. «I wanted to become a superhero who makes such stamped villains like you ... With one stroke.» He angrily says that he has finished his job search and is distracting the crab himself, Krabinator only beats Saitama several times, saying that he is not a hero, but only a budget, and that he has no chance against him, but it only cost Krabinator to relax, As Saitama grabs one by the eye and pulls it out, thereby defeating the crab monster. After this battle Saitama decides to become a mighty superhero, he starts a daily training schedule, which consisted of 100 push-ups, 100 sit-ups and 10 km of running every day. He also ate three meals a day, but only bananas as tomorrow, and also do not use air conditioning to strengthen his moral resistance. These daily activities were very cruel and caused him painful pains, such as muscle pains and internal bleeding. However, Saitama did not give up and continued training day after day to become a superhero." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_saitama_serious_punch" "Serious Punch" "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_saitama_serious_punch_Description" "Saitama has a chance to unleash a devastating strike when attacking an enemy, dealing massive damage based on his current attack damage.<br><br>The damage is further increased by %damage_multiplier_per_stack_pct%%% for each stack of Limiter Saitama has." "DOTA_Tooltip_ability_saitama_serious_punch_Lore" "Let me become a bit more serious, so that you put all of yourself into this battle..."         "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_chicken_ability_1" "Chickenification"
        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_chicken_ability_1_Lore" "It's almost as if there's a symbiotic relationship between the chicken and the host... how strange!"
        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_chicken_ability_1_Description" "Chicken can take an allied hero as a host, sharing attack damage and spell damage with them. If the host dies, Chicken dies too. Chicken has maximum speed, cannot be damaged, and can only damage enemies while inside a host. He gains the same gold and experience as the host when they kill an enemy. Consuming a Tome also grants attributes to the host."

Your attack damage is decreased by %anomaly_damage_reduction%%% but enemies caught in the anomaly have their attack speed, movement speed and cast speed reduced by %anomaly_reduction%%%.<br><br>Every time an enemy uses an ability while inside of the anomaly, the cooldown of that ability is increased by %anomaly_cooldown_increase%%%.

	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form" "Reaper Form"
	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form_Description" "Necrophos enters his Reaper form and moves beyond the mortal veil.<br><br>While in Reaper form, Necrophos loses a portion of his health every second, increasing in severity the longer the ability is active. He is unable to restore health by normal means, but takes less damage, moves faster and gets access to a new arsenal of abilities.<br><br>When Necrophos health is depleted, he will exit Reaper form, as well as have some of his health restored. Any remaining active instances of his abilities will disappear."
	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form_scepter_Description" "Grants Necrophos the <b color='white'>Aesthetics of Death</b> ability while in Reaper Form."
	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form_hp_drain_pct" "%HEALTH DRAIN:"
	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form_hp_drain_increase" "%INCREASE PER SECOND:"
	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form_duration_end_hp_restored_pct" "%HEALTH RESTORED ON EXIT:"
	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form_damage_reduction" "%DAMAGE REDUCTION:"
	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form_move_speed" "%MOVEMENT SPEED:"
	//"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form_required_charges" "REQUIRED Sadist stacks:"

	"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte_reaper_form_buff" "Reaper Form"
	"DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_necrolyte_reaper_form_buff_Description" "Movement speed increased by %dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_MOVESPEED_BONUS_PERCENTAGE%%% and incoming damage reduced by -%dMODIFIER_PROPERTY_INCOMING_DAMAGE_PERCENTAGE%%%. Your health is continously drained every second, and the ability ends when your health is depleted."

	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form_exit" "Exit"
	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_reaper_form_exit_Description" "Immediately exits Reaper Form."

	"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_necrolyte_death_coil" "Death Coil"

The damage type and additional effects depends on your primary attribute. Lightning proc can occur once every %jump_cooldown% seconds.\n<h1><font color='lightgreen'>Passive: Static Lightning (Agility)</font></h1>Static Lightning deals physical damage, does an additional %agi_damage%%% of your Agility as damage and applies a debuff to each enemy hit that decreases their armor by %debuff_armor_pct%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds.\n<h1><font color='lightblue'>Passive: Static Lightning (Intellect)</font></h1>Static Lightning deals magical damage, does an additional %int_damage%%% of your Intellect as damage and applies a debuff that increases the magical damage they take from all sources by %debuff_magic_increase%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds.\n<h1><font color='tomato'>Passive: Static Lightning (Strength)</font></h1>Static Lightning deals magical damage, does an additional %str_damage%%% of your Strength and %str_damage_from_hp_pct%%% of your Max Health as damage and applies a debuff that decreases their outgoing damage by %debuff_damage_reduction%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds. Each enemy hit increases your health by %str_buff_hp_increase_per_target_pct%%% of your Max Health for %str_buff_duration% seconds (stacks up to %str_buff_max_stacks% times)."

        "DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_staff_of_conduits4_Description" "<h1>Active: Static Shield</h1>Places a static shield on a unit for %shield_duration% seconds, which releases a static lightning when attacked.\n<h1>Passive: Static Lightning</h1>Attacks have a %chance%%% chance to release a bolt of lightning that jumps between %jump_count% enemies within a %radius% radius every %jump_delay% seconds, dealing %damage% damage to each. The damage type and additional effects depends on your primary attribute. Lightning proc can occur once every %jump_cooldown% seconds.\n<h1><font color='lightgreen'>Passive: Static Lightning (Agility)</font></h1>Static Lightning deals physical damage, does an additional %agi_damage%%% of your Agility as damage and applies a debuff to each enemy hit that decreases their armor by %debuff_armor_pct%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds.\n<h1><font color='lightblue'>Passive: Static Lightning (Intellect)</font></h1>Static Lightning deals magical damage, does an additional %int_damage%%% of your Intellect as damage and applies a debuff that increases the magical damage they take from all sources by %debuff_magic_increase%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds.\n<h1><font color='tomato'>Passive: Static Lightning (Strength)</font></h1>Static Lightning deals magical damage, does an additional %str_damage%%% of your Strength and %str_damage_from_hp_pct%%% of your Max Health as damage and applies a debuff that decreases their outgoing damage by %debuff_damage_reduction%%% for %debuff_duration% seconds. Each enemy hit increases your health by %str_buff_hp_increase_per_target_pct%%% of your Max Health for %str_buff_duration% seconds (stacks up to %str_buff_max_stacks% times)."
